title: 【FuseRealism】现实融合材质包【1.10/1.11/1.12/1.13/1.14/1.15/1.16】【256x/512x】
author: 爱心魔王FHC
txt_content:
本帖最后由 爱心魔王FHC 于 2021-1-22 13:14 编辑 



简介引用自原帖

This texture pack was designed for people who love realistic styled Minecraft. I decided to create a resource pack with high resolution textures (100+ textures). All textures are in 512×512 resolution.

我决定制作一个高分辨率的材质包（有100多张材质），所有的材质都是512x分辨率的，专门为喜欢现实风格的人设计的。

This Resource Pack Has Hundreds of Ultra Realistic And Seemless Textures Including:

材质包有上百张超逼真的和超棒的纹理材质

Tree barks 树皮
Nature Textures Grass, Snow, Dirt Etc… 自然的草、雪、泥土等等
Tiles, Planks, And Terracotta 瓷砖、木板、陶瓦
Plants 植物
Ambient Sounds Birds Chirping, Wind, Etc…
鸟叫的环境音效、风等等

If You Dont Hear Any Ambient Sounds Make Sure you have Music Volume On Highest.

如果你没有听到任何环境音乐，请确保你把音乐音量开到最大

It’s highly recommended to use shaders with it. This improves the overall quality of the resource pack.

极度推荐使用光影配合材质，整个材质的效果会有很大的提升。

NOTE: This resource pack is still in development. There are still some bugs so don’t complain in the comments.

注意：这个材质包仍在改进中，仍有有一些BUG，所以不要在评论区里抱怨啦XD


图片展示



Better Grass And Foliage!
更好的草和植物！


Planks, Floors, And Other Textures Added!
木板、地板和其它被添加的材质！


Logs Textured Including Acacia And Jungle
原木材质（包括丛林木和金合欢木）


Textures Have Andesite, Diorite, and Granite
安山岩、闪长岩、花岗岩的材质


Concrete, Tiles, And Other Textures Added!
混泥土、砖块和其他材质被添加




-New Vegetation Textures Like Fern, Double Fern, Tallgrass, Double Tallgrass!
-新的植物材质像蕨类植物、大型蕨、草丛、高草丛！


New Logs & Leaves Added For All Trees!
给所有的树添加新的原木和树叶！


-New Log Tops Are Finally Added To The Game!
-新的树叶顶端材质最终加入了游戏！


-New Added Textures Such as Ice, Tiles, Bedrock And Clay
-新添加的材质例如冰、砖块、基岩和黏土


I Forgot to Add Coal Ore To the Game So I Added in Coal Ore And Coal Ore
我忘记加入媒煤矿材质了，所以我现在加入了


New High Quality Plank Textures Perfect For Houses, Huts, Buildings
全新的高质量木板材质，适用于房子、小屋、高楼


-Fixed Logs And Now Made Them More Round!
-修复原木材质，现在看起来更圆了！


-New Textures Sdded Such As Concrete Bricks, Sponge, Mahogany Wood, And Brass Path.
-添加新的材质，例如混凝土、海绵、红木、草径。


-Fixed Horrible Looking Leaves!
-修复了看起来可怕的树叶！


-New Textures Added Such As Hardened Clays, Monster Spawners, Nether Brick, And More!
-新增硬化黏土、刷怪笼、地狱砖和其他更多的材质！


-Added High Detailed Hardened Stained Clays!
-添加高细节的硬化黏土！




-New Item Textures Like All Swords, Pickaxes, Axes, Hoes, Shovels, i Also Added Other Items Such as Food Like Meat, Apples, Ender Pearls And Much More!
-新的物品材质，像剑、稿、斧头、锄头、铲子，还添加了其他物品例如食物，像肉、苹果，末影珍珠还有其他更多！




-Fixed Many Textures Like Andesite, Diorite, Granite, Mossy Stones, Iron Block, Gold Block.
-修复了许多材质，像安山岩、闪长岩、花岗岩、苔石、铁块、金块。


-Finally Added All The Plants eg. Flowers, Grass
-最后还添加了植物的材质，比如花、草


-Added Magma…
-添加了岩浆的材质……


-Now Here’s a Beautiful Picture Of My Texture Pack
-这里是用材质包拍的一张漂亮图片


–Fixed The Bevel on Block Like Gold, Diamond, Iron, And Emerald Block.
-修改了矿物快的斜角


-New Bed Textures
-床的全新材质


-Fixed The Leave Textures, I Didn’t Mask the Texture When i first Made Them.
-修改了树叶材质


–Added Many Nether Blocks Like Quartz, Netherrack, And Much More.
-添加了许多地狱方块，比如石英块，地狱岩等等


-Added Armour Models
-添加了盔甲的材质


-Added Saplings And Fixed Some Foliage Issues
-添加了树苗的材质并修复了一些植物材质的错误










-Now Here’s a Beautiful Picture Of My FuseRealism
-这是几张用作者材质包的截图

材质安装

Put Resource Pack In Resource_Packs
把材质包放进Resource_Packs文件夹

Launch Game
启动游戏，选择材质

Have Fun!
玩的愉快！


适用版本：1.10/1.11/1.12/1.13/1.14
分辨率：256x/512x
作者：OCCULTFUSION
链接: https://pan.baidu.com/s/1-CcqXtGlVyZ55Lt6gQLfMw
提取码: fuse

感谢wangtianen对翻译提出的建议
